text: Hey Jason check out CloudFiles. Clever 2-way file integration between HubSpot and Google drive / Onedrive / Sharepoint / Box / Dropbox. Check out their custom workflow actions to automate it too. <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/sales/sales-enablement/cloudfiles>
Hi Rakesh, did you solve this? It sounds like you just need to make a call from your app to HubSpot API to get contact details and save to your third party app DB
